message.body: So last night was amazing, thank you! You're seriously very talented, I mean it. xx ilana
P.S. I want the mom in the pool piece. I can't stop thinking about it. I just love it, the colors are incredible. Would you ever do a "non-gallery markup

Oh I am so glad you liked my work. It would definitely be a pleasure to work something out with you. I'll send you some images of work that is less. The mom in the pool piece is an all time favorite. Can't go low on thAt
